"A Dragorii Tongue-Lashing":
"Now wait a second! No one ever told me about this!
I was over on the Skyscape raising hell, when all
of a sudden I see these dragorii firing energized
rounds at me--and from their tongues no less! What's
up with that?! I think they're called Baridrans or
something like that. They look kind of strange,
so who knows what else they're gonna do? As usual,
I wanna see how you'd handle 'em!

*Target: Hostiles level 34 or higher"

"ちょっと待てよ、聞いてねーぞ！
浮遊大陸でブイブイ言わせてたらさ。
舌からエネルギー弾みてーなのを撃ってくる
龍族が出てきたんだよ！
バリドランっつったかな？
見た目もちょっとアレだし、他にも何して
くるのかわかったもんじゃねーからよ。
いつもの攻略、いっちょよろしく！

※Lv.34～のエネミーが対象"
